name: DeepBlue (nealith)
description: After the collapsing of the world and the rising waters, survivor of the humanity are force to sail on infinity seas. To survive and develop their fleet, , people try to recover material from the past world by piloting subarine in deep sea. In these depths, the light disappears, the pressure crack the hull, and some terribles animals prowl. You can only count on sonars. Lot of pilot are plagued by strong anxiety . Will you be enouth brave to explore this world ?
